content:
Hello All,
I am new to zulip. And I want to contribute to the design part of zulip.I am a professional UI/UX designer based in India.
Here are my behance and dribbble link :
https://www.behance.net/nitinjn6845654? and
https://dribbble.com/Knitinjain
I heard about the zulip summer of code program but wasn't aware of this earlier So can I join now?
CC: @Tim Abbott

Cool, welcome @Nitin Jain! Some of your stuff looks really cool :)
The Zulip Summer of Code program's application deadline is passed, but let's chat in PMs about how you might get involved!
